The Supperclub

About

SUPPER CLUB BTR HAS BROUGHT AN ELEVATED DINING CONCEPT TO THE BATON ROUGE AREA WITH A REFINED EXPERIENCE, CONVERSATION-PROVOKING ATMOSPHERE, PREMIUM INGREDIENTS AND UNIQUE DISHES. WE HAVE EVOLVED THE IDEA OF A TRADITIONAL SUPPER CLUB AND PUT A LEVEL OF ARTISTRY AND INTENTIONALITY INTO EVERY DETAIL TO BRING OUR GUESTS A TRULY MEMORABLE DINING EXPERIENCE.

Find us on Instagram

    FAQS

  • ARE YOUR HOURS OF OPERATION? WE ACCEPT RESERVATIONS: TUESDAY - SATURDAY: 5:00 PM - 10:00 PM WE ARE CLOSED ON SUNDAYS AND MONDAYS.
  • DO I NEED A RESERVATION? A CONFIRMED RESERVATION IS REQUIRED TO ENTER THE BUILDING. BAR SEATS CAN BE RESERVED. ALL RESERVATIONS FOR SUPPER CLUB BTR MUST BE MADE THROUGH OUR WEBSITE: SUPPERCLUBBTR.COM. Supperclubbtr.com
  • DO YOU ACCOMMODATE LARGE PARTIES? ‍DUE TO LIMITED SPACE, THE LARGEST PARTY SIZE WE CAN ACCOMMODATE IS 8 PATRONS. WE ASK THAT THE ENTIRE PARTY BE PRESENT IN ORDER TO BE SEATED. IF YOU HAVE A PARTY LARGER THAN 8, PLEASE RESERVE THE RUMOR ROOM.
  • DO YOU HAVE A PRIVATE DINING ROOM AVAILABLE FOR MEETINGS OR EVENTS? ‍WE DO HAVE ONE SEPARATE AREA FOR PRIVATE GROUPS THAT CAN ACCOMMODATE BETWEEN 8-12 PATRONS. THERE IS A $500 DEPOSIT NEEDED TO RESERVE THE RUMOR ROOM, AND A $3000 ROOM MINIMUM. YOUR DEPOSIT WILL COUNT TOWARDS THE MINIMUM.
  • CAN I RESERVE THE RUMOR ROOM? ALL RESERVATIONS MUST BE CONFIRMED THROUGH PERSONAL EMAIL OR PHONE CALL. DIRECT ALL RUMOR ROOM RESERVATIONS AND INQUIRIES TO SHANNON LOPEZ. shannon.lopez@supperclubbtr.com
  • WHAT IS THE DRESS CODE? THE SUPPER CLUB DRESS CODE IS ELEGANT CASUAL.
  • MEN: A COLLARED SHIRT OR JACKET IS REQUIRED. PLEASE WEAR SLACKS OR DARK WASH JEANS WITHOUT HOLES OR FRAYS. JEANS SHOULD BE ACCOMPANIED BY A JACKET. MEN SHOULD NOT WEAR SANDALS, SUNGLASSES, HATS, SHORTS, OR ATHLETIC WEAR. DRESS SHOES OR DRESSY SNEAKERS ARE ACCEPTABLE.
  • FOR WOMEN: WOMEN SHOULD DRESS IN COCKTAIL OR EVENING ATTIRE. DRESSES, PANT SUITS, SKIRTS WORN WITH A BLOUSE, OR SHORTS WORN WITH A BLAZER ARE ALL ACCEPTABLE. PLEASE DO NOT WEAR BLUE JEAN SHORTS, DAY TIME SHORTS, SUNGLASSES, HATS, OR SHEER OR SEE THROUGH PANTS/SKIRTS.
  • DRESS CODE POLICY IS AT THE DISCRETION OF MANAGEMENT, AND IS STRICTLY ENFORCED. ALL DECISIONS ARE MADE TO ENHANCE THE EXPERIENCE OF OUR GUESTS.
  • ARE CHILDREN ALLOWED AT SUPPER CLUB BTR? ‍WHILE WE DO NOT PROHIBIT CHILDREN, WE STRONGLY DISCOURAGE CHILDREN UNDER THE AGE OF 12. WE DO NOT HAVE HIGH-CHAIRS OR BOOSTER SEATS. THERE IS NO KIDS MENU AVAILABLE.
  • WHAT IS THE CANCELLATION POLICY? ‍WE REQUIRE A $25 PER PERSON DEPOSIT AT THE TIME OF RESERVATION, WHICH WILL GO TOWARDS YOUR BILL. IF YOU NEED TO CANCEL YOUR RESERVATION, PLEASE CALL OR EMAIL THE RESTAURANT AT LEAST 48 HOURS PRIOR TO THE TIME OF YOUR RESERVATION TO RECEIVE A REFUND FOR YOUR DEPOSIT. ALL RESERVATIONS WILL BE SUBJECT TO A PRE-CONFIRMATION FOR ALL RESERVATIONS WITH REMINDERS SENT 24 HOURS IN ADVANCE. NO SHOWS OR LATE CANCELLATIONS WILL VOID YOUR DEPOSIT BEING REFUNDED. RESERVATIONS WILL BE HELD FOR NO MORE THAN 15 MINUTES AFTER YOUR RESERVATION TIME.
  • DO YOU OFFER LIVE MUSIC? ‍WE HAVE A DJ NIGHTLY FOR SERVICE.
  • DO YOU HAVE A CORKAGE FEE? ‍WE HAVE A $25 CORKAGE FEE PER BOTTLE FOR ANY BOTTLE OF WINE BROUGHT BY A PATRON.
  • WHAT IS YOUR CELEBRATION POLICY? ‍WE WELCOME YOU TO CELEBRATE ANY SPECIAL OCCASION AT SUPPER CLUB BTR. IN ORDER TO ENSURE ALL GUESTS ENJOY THEIR DINING EXPERIENCE, WE REQUEST THAT NO BALLOONS OR DECORATIONS BE BROUGHT INTO THE RESTAURANT. WE DO ALLOW GUESTS TO BRING IN THEIR OWN CAKE, HOWEVER, THERE WILL BE A CAKE-CUTTING FEE OF $20 PER CAKE.
  • DO YOU OFFER PARKING? ‍PLENTY OF PARKING SPOTS ARE AVAILABLE FOR SELF-PARKING. IN THE EVENT OF BAD WEATHER, WE OFFER COMPLIMENTARY ASSISTANCE FOR GUESTS AT OUR FRONT DOOR CANOPY.
  • HOW DO I PROVIDE FEEDBACK? ‍ feedback@supperclubbtr.com
